Parameters.Name: ADVANCED_SECURITY-7-1-1-v15.06 Configure IEEE 802.1X Configuration
Parameters.Description: A.24 NO ID A.46 HelperUploadPassphrase A.18 HelperCreateCertificationPath_CACertificates A.4 HelperCreateCACertificate A.16 HelperUploadCASignedCertificate A.14 HelperCreateCASignedCertificate A.7 HelperCreateRSAKeyPair A.6 HelperDetermineRSAKeyLength A.10 HelperGetServiceCapabilities A.3 HelperCreateCertificateFromPKCS10CSR A.15 HelperUploadCertificate A.47 HelperDeleteDot1XConfiguration A.23 HelperDeletePassphrase A.17 HelperDeleteCertificationPath2 A.1 HelperDeleteRSAKeyPair A.9 HelperDeleteCertWithKey

Test.Name: Correct response (several Dot1X configurations)
Test.Description: The DUT sends all correct responses

Test.Name: Correct response (one Dot1X configuration)
Test.Description: The DUT sends all correct responses

Test.Name: Invalid response: wrong GetAllDot1XConfigurationsResponse (no requiered ID)
Test.Description: 10. If configurationList does not contain dot1XID, FAIL the test, and go to the step 16.

Test.Name: Invalid response: wrong GetAllDot1XConfigurationsResponse (no requiered ID - empty list)
Test.Description: 10. If configurationList does not contain dot1XID, FAIL the test, and go to the step 16.

Test.Name: Invalid response: wrong GetAllDot1XConfigurationsResponse (wrong Alias)
Test.Description: 11. If configurationList [Dot1XID = dot1XID].Alias is not equal to “ONVIF_Dot1X_Test”, FAIL the test, and go to the step 16.

Test.Name: Incorrect response: fault for DeletePassphrase (wrong fault)
Test.Description: 12. ONVIF Client invokes DeletePassphrase with parameters • PassphraseID := passphraseID 13. The DUT returns env:Sender/ter:InvalidArgVal/ter:ReferenceExists SOAP 1.2 fault.

Test.Name: Incorrect response: fault for DeletePassphrase (no fault)
Test.Description: 12. ONVIF Client invokes DeletePassphrase with parameters • PassphraseID := passphraseID 13. The DUT returns env:Sender/ter:InvalidArgVal/ter:ReferenceExists SOAP 1.2 fault.

Test.Name: Incorrect response: fault for DeleteCertificationPath (wrong fault)
Test.Description: 14. ONVIF Client invokes DeleteCertificationPath with parameters • CertificationPathID := certPathID 15. The DUT returns env:Sender/ter:InvalidArgVal/ter:ReferenceExists SOAP 1.2 fault.

Test.Name: Incorrect response: fault for DeleteCertificationPath (no fault)
Test.Description: 14. ONVIF Client invokes DeleteCertificationPath with parameters • CertificationPathID := certPathID 15. The DUT returns env:Sender/ter:InvalidArgVal/ter:ReferenceExists SOAP 1.2 fault.
